data.title: Illinois Wesleyan University
data.meta_description: Illinois Wesleyan University is a ​nationally recognized private liberal arts ​u​niversity located in Bloomington, Illinois. It offers broad-based learning in over 100 majors, minors and programs, including pre-professional programs. The university is exclusively undergraduate, with a focus on student success, and has a vibrant campus life with over 100 student organizations. Founded in 1850, Illinois Wesleyan University is dedicated to providing a quality education in a supportive and inclusive environment.
data.text:
Visit Campus

We'd love to meet you, introduce ourselves, and learn where you are in your college selection process! Application questions? Financial Aid? Introduction to IWU? Whatever questions you have, we are here for you!

Schedule your visit

Do the Most Good

When colleges are stacked up based on what they do for the world, Illinois Wesleyan University is #5 in the nation among four-year baccalaureate institutions – a Washington Monthly ranking that looks at contribution to the public good.

And we're named a "Best Bang for the Buck" for helping students attain marketable degrees at affordable prices. Illinois Wesleyan consistently ranks in the top tier across numerous markers for a quality education, return on investment and student satisfaction.

What the Guidebooks Say

Best College for Getting a Job

Illinois Wesleyan University ranks #7 in the nation and #1 in Illinois on Zippia's 2023 list of The Best Colleges for Getting a Job, based on Department of Education College Scorecard data. 97.3% of Illinois Wesleyan University graduates in the class of 2022 were employed or in graduate school within six months of graduation, based on a First-Destination Survey.

Employers recognize that Illinois Wesleyan’s focus on broad-based learning with practical application creates well-rounded students who become curious, creative problem-solvers.

Learn More

Watch Us on the College Tour

Illinois Wesleyan University is featured in an episode of The College Tour, a television series that highlights colleges across the United States through the voices of students. You'll hear from peers why IWU is known as “The AND University,” offering the perfect fit for multi-talented students.

Watch Now
